Aotearoa Bird GIFs

Welcome to Aotearoa Bird GIFs, the home of your bird GIF needs.

License

Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 New Zealand (CC BY-SA 3.0 NZ)

Contributions

If you would like to add GIFs to this collection there are two ways to do so:

  • Email the GIF or Video to bird.gif.submissions AT karit DOT NZ
  • Do a pull request on the Aotearoa Bird GIFs GitHub repository

Support the site

Currently this site is using the free Netlify, which is currently free. It is free currently if under 100GB a month in traffic, currently don’t know how much traffic there will be. If you would like to help support this site please get in touch

Contact

  • Twitter: @nzbirdgifs
  • Email: bird.gif AT karit DOT NZ
